Key Arguments: The bill will block real information because gatekeepers cannot accurately distinguish between misinformation and real information.
Hiding misinformation will drive it underground, preventing responsible debate.
Individuals disseminating information should be held accountable and not allowed to hide behind aliases.
Both sides of an argument should be presented so people can make informed decisions.
Education and identification of information disseminators are better solutions than removing misinformation.
Main Themes: Concerns about censorship and freedom of information
Notable Quotes: By controlling misinformation and/or disinformation this bill is going to guarantee that real information, backed by studies, is going to be blocked...
People must be educated and not kept in the dark by misinformation removal...
